project.description:
Release build of SmartClassifier 3.5.2 - builds code from:
         - repo: https://bitbucket.org/nxtlbs-devops/smartclassifier
         - branch: v3.5.2

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
export NLEXTERNALDIR=D:/P4/main_external export JAVA_HOME=${NLEXTERNALDIR2}/j2sdk/jdk1.7.0_75
cd ${WORKSPACE}
############################ # Clean the workspace ############################ git clean -fd && true git add . git stash && true git stash drop && true ############################
# Build the common components cd ${WORKSPACE}/Common/ source ./setEnv ./buildRelease
# Build the CASExtension cd ${WORKSPACE}/CASExtension/ source ./setEnv ./buildRelease
# Build the common library cd ${WORKSPACE}/CommonLibrary/ source ./setEnv ./buildRelease
# Build DocumentExtractor module cd ${WORKSPACE}/DocumentExtractor/ source ./setEnv ./buildRelease
# Copy nextlabs-document-extractor.jar needed for Extractor build if [ -f "${WORKSPACE}/FileExtractor/build/nextlabs-document-extractor.jar" ] ; then cp ${WORKSPACE}/FileExtractor/build/nextlabs-document-extractor.jar ${WORKSPACE}/Extractor/lib/jar/ fi
# Build Watcher module cd ${WORKSPACE}/Watcher/ source ./setEnv ./buildRelease
# Build Extractor module cd ${WORKSPACE}/Extractor/ source ./setEnv ./buildRelease
# Build RuleEngine module cd ${WORKSPACE}/RuleEngine/ source ./setEnv ./buildRelease
# Build Indexer module cd ${WORKSPACE}/Indexer/ source ./setEnv ./buildRelease
# Build Plugin module cd ${WORKSPACE}/Plugin/ source ./setEnv ./buildRelease
# Build WebUI module cd ${WORKSPACE}/WebUI/ source ./setEnv ./buildRelease
#######################################
# Finally, perform nsis install creation cd ${WORKSPACE}/Installer/ source ./setEnv ./buildRelease
## EOF ##
